page.shortlink: api expression common order eliminate function
page.description: Simplify the order expression if possible.
page.syntax: New_Order_String as C = EXPRESSION_COMMON_ORDER_ELIMINATE( C expression)

argument.name: expression
argument.description: An expression that orders records in a query.

page.example: order = "Firstname + Lastname + Company + Firstname + Lastname + Company" expression_common_order_eliminate(order) -> "Firstname + Lastname + Company"
